required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase Ia/Ib Clinical Trial of IBI360 Monotherapy or in Combination With Sintilimab and (or) Chemotherapy in Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ia/Ib Open-Label, Multi-Center Clinical Trial to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of IBI360 Monotherapy or in Combination With Sintilimab and (or) Chemotherapy in Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label Phase Ia trial to evaluate safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and preliminary efficacy of IBI360 monotherapy in Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors

detailed_description.textblock: Phase Ia is dose escalation and dose expansion study of IBI360 monotherapy in advanced or metastatic Solid Tumors.

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 90 days following last dose
primary_outcome.description: Participant safety is characterized by frequency and severity of adverse events(according to NCI CTCAE 5.0)

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 21 days following last dose level
primary_outcome.description: A recommended phase 2 dose will be determined based on safety data including dose limiting toxicities, preliminary efficacy data, and PK data

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects were randomized 6 months and 1 year later
secondary_outcome.description: Tumor response will be determined by the revised Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors version 1.1 (RECISTv1.1).

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under plasma concentration vs time curve(AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 48 weeks following first dose
Up to 48 weeks following first dose
Up to 48 weeks following first dose
up to 90 days following last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of anti-drug antibodies (ADA) will be measured

intervention.description: IBI 360 dose level of escalation IV Q3W Day 1
